side-nav.SIDENAV_LABEL: Open the main menu any time using this handle.
side-nav.ORGANISATIONS_LABEL: Access your dashboard to manage your organisations and their parameters.
side-nav.SETTINGS_LABEL: Update general settings of the system on your device.

organisations.ORGANISATIONS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the organisations in your organisation.
organisations.ORGANISATION_DEFINITION_LABEL: An organisation is a shared workspace where you can invite people to join and collaborate.
organisations.ORGANISATION_LABEL: Enter the context of one of your organisation by selecting its name.
organisations.ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: Enter the context of this organisation
organisations.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your organisations in the arising bar to perform a search.
organisations.SORT_LABEL: Sort your organisations by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
organisations.NEW_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Create a new organisation using this button.
organisations.NEW_ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: How to create a new organisation to share your events
organisations.EVENTS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the events in your organisation.
organisations.CATALOG_LABEL: Use this shortcut to manage the geographic catalog of your organisation.
organisations.PLANS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the plans in your organisation.
organisations.ARCHIVED_PLANS_LABEL: Use this shortcut to open the history of your plans.
organisations.ARCHIVED_PLANS_LINK_LABEL: How to explore the history of your plans
organisations.MANAGEMENT_LABEL: Reveal actions to manage your organisation.
organisations.OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Other activities are available through this menu.
organisations.MEMBERS_LABEL: This entry allows to manage the members of your organisation.
organisations.GROUPS_LABEL: This entry allows to manage the groups in your organisation.
organisations.EVENT_TEMPLATES_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the event templates in your organisation.
organisations.PLAN_TEMPLATES_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the plan templates in your organisation.
organisations.DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Update the description of your organisation.
organisations.SETTINGS_LABEL: This entry allows to update the settings of your organisation (name, logo, etc.).
organisations.REMOVE_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Remove your organisation through this action.
organisations.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: @:tours.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL) You must first remove all your organisation groups.

organisation.NAME_LABEL: Update the name of your organisation.
organisation.AVATAR_LABEL: Update the logo of your organisation (256x256 or 512x512 image recommanded).
organisation.COLOR_LABEL: Update the brand color of your organisation.
organisation.CUSTOMER_LABEL: This section recaps your current method of payment.
organisation.PAYMENT_METHOD_LABEL: This button allows to update it.
organisation.CUSTOMER_EMAIL_LABEL: Select the owner of the organisation who will receive the invoices.
organisation.INVOICE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a mention to be added to your invoice.
organisation.VAT_NUMBER_LABEL: If your payment is related to a company please enter your VAT number here.
organisation.CARD_LABEL: Insert here the information of your payment card.
organisation.BASIC_PLAN_LABEL: This section shows your plan and those available.
organisation.SILVER_PLAN_LABEL: You can change it anytime for a new one better suited to your needs.
organisation.OPTIONAL_PLANS_LABEL: This section shows your additional plans.
organisation.ARCHIVING_PLAN_LABEL: Activate events archiving by selecting this plan.
organisation.CATALOG_PLAN_LABEL: Activate the geographic catalog by selecting this plan.

events.EVENTS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the events in your organisation.
events.EVENT_DEFINITION_LABEL: An event allows you to share information and photos as well as interacting with participants on the field.
events.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your events in the arising bar to perform a search.
events.SORT_LABEL: Sort your events by ascending or descending alphabetical/chronological order this button.
events.TEMPLATES_LABEL: Before creating an event you need to create at least one model using this activity.
events.SELECT_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Whenever you want to create a new event simply pick the right template using the action button.
events.EVENT_CARD_LABEL: Each event is viewed as a card providing available actions.
events.MANAGEMENT_LABEL: Reveal actions to manage your event.
events.UPDATE_EVENT_LABEL: Update the name and icon of your event through this action.
events.UPDATE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Update the description of your event through this action.
events.UPDATE_LOCATION_LABEL: Update the location of your event through this action.
events.UPDATE_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Update participants of your event through this action.
events.UPDATE_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Update coordinators of your event through this action.
events.UPDATE_PROPERTIES_LABEL:

notification to all participants or not.
events.EVENT_LOGS_LABEL: As a coordinator follow participants of this event and interact with them through this action.
events.FOLLOW_UP_ACTION_LABEL: As a participant you can interact with your coordinator through this action.
events.BROWSE_MEDIA_LABEL: View and join files associated to your event through this action.
events.EVENT_MAP_LABEL: View the map of your event through this action.
events.NAVIGATE_MENU_LABEL: View itinerary of your event through this action.
events.REMOVE_EVENT_LABEL: Remove your event through this action.

notification to all participants.

event-templates.SORT_LABEL: Sort your templates by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.

event-templates.TEMPLATE_CARD_LABEL: Each model is viewed as a card providing available actions.
event-templates.UPDATE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Update the name and icon of your model through this action.

event-templates.UPDATE_PROPERTIES_LABEL: Similarly, update the properties of your model through the action associated to each field.
event-templates.EDIT_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Update participants of your template through this action.
event-templates.EDIT_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Update coordinators of your template through this action.
event-templates.EDIT_EXPIRY_DURATION_LABEL: Update default duration of your template through this action.
event-templates.EDIT_PERMISSION_LABEL: Update permissions of your event template through this action.

event-templates.EDIT_WORKFLOW_LABEL: Edit the workflow of your model using this option.
event-templates.REMOVE_WORKFLOW_LABEL: Remove the workflow from your model using this option.

event-templates.REMOVE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Remove your model through this action.
event-templates.ORGANISATION_MENU_LABEL: Use the top dropdown menu to easily view your events or the plans of your organisation.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_LABEL: A process is a sequence of interactions. Each one defines a question a user has to go through before jumping to the next step.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_LABEL: The steps sequence is visible in this section and you can switch to one or another by selecting it.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_TITLE_LABEL: Choose a title for your step as visible by users.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon for your step to identify quickly the status of the participant within the process.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Choose a description for your step as visible by users.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_INTERACTION_LABEL: Choose possible responses for users in your step. Simply type each response and validate, this will create a chip.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_INTERACTION_ICON_LABEL: By selecting the chip you will be able to change the associated icon so that you identify quickly the status of the participant within the process.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_END_LABEL: Choose responses allowing users to quit the process at this step.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_STEP_STAKEHOLDER_LABEL: Select which users will answer the question at this step.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_ADD_STEP_LABEL: Add a step to your process when required.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_REMOVE_STEP_LABEL: Remove a step from your process when required.
event-templates.WORKFLOW_PREVIEW_STEP_LABEL: Preview the interactions of your process.
event-templates.CREATE_WORKFLOW_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new workflow.

create-event-template.TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a detailed description for your model.

create-event-template.EXPIRY_LABEL: Select the duration in days before the event automatically expires.
create-event-template.PERMISSION_LABEL: Select the role or rights required to create events from this model.

archived-events.HISTORY_LABEL: This activity provides a history view of your events displayed sequentially in a selected time range.
archived-events.TIMELINE_LABEL: Use the timeline to change the default time range.
archived-events.START_TIME_LABEL: Using the interactive calendar select the start date defining the oldest events that will be visible.
archived-events.END_TIME_LABEL: Using the interactive calendar select the end date defining the newest events that will be visible.
archived-events.TIME_RANGES_LABEL: For a quick setup select a predefined time range.
archived-events.HISTORY_SCROLL_LABEL: Browse your events by scrolling to the bottom of the screen.
archived-events.HISTORY_EVENTS_LABEL: You first need to select a relevant time range to display some events.
archived-events.HISTORY_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your events as a CSV file to use it in a thrid-party application if you'd like.
archived-events.HISTORY_FILTER_LABEL: Filter the status of displayed events if you'd like.
archived-events.MAP_VIEW_LABEL: Switch to a map view of your events using this button.
archived-events.BY_TEMPLATE_LABEL: By default all events are grouped together but you can group them according to your templates using this button.
archived-events.BY_TEMPLATE_LAYERS_LABEL: Using the side panel you can then show/hide the events related to a particular template.
archived-events.HEATMAP_LABEL: Switch to a heatmap view of your events using this button.
archived-events.MAP_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your events as a GeoJSON file to use it in a thrid-party mapping application if you'd like.
archived-events.HISTORY_VIEW_LABEL: Switch to a history view of your events using this button.
archived-events.CHART_VIEW_LABEL: Create statistics charts of your events using this button.
archived-events.CHART_LABEL: Charts allows to analyse the distribution (i.e. their count) of your events according to your templates.
archived-events.CHART_SAVE_LABEL: Tip: right-click on the graph anytime to export it as an image.
archived-events.CHART_SETTINGS_LABEL: Configure your chart using this button.
archived-events.CHART_TYPE_LABEL: Select the chart type: pie chart, bar chart, etc.
archived-events.CHART_COUNT_LABEL: Then select the number of templates per chart.
archived-events.CHART_COUNT_PAGINATION_LABEL: If the total number of templates is too much large different charts will be generated and you will be able to navigate through using the arrows on the screen sides.
archived-events.CHART_RENDER_LABEL: Last select the value to be displayed: events count, events percentage or participants count.
archived-events.CHART_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your chart data as a CSV file to use it in a thrid-party application if you'd like.
archived-events.ORGANISATION_MENU_LABEL: Use the top dropdown menu to easily view the plans of your organisation.

PasswordManager.TITLE: Change my password
PasswordManager.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Your password has been successfully changed

EmailManager.TITLE: Change my email address
EmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: To validate your new email address, enter the code you received by email
EmailManager.EMAIL_CHANGED: You new address has been taken into account. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.

DeleteAccountManager.TITLE: Delete my account
DeleteAccountManager.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
DeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Warning: the deletion of your account is irrevocable and all data attached to it will be lost
DeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION: Enter your account name to confirm the deletion

VerifyEmailManager.TITLE: Check my email address
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_LABEL: Why should I verify my email address ?
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_TEXT: Verifying your email address improves the security of your account. Once you have verified your email address, both your password and access to your email account are required in order to make any changes to your account credentials, such as your password and contact email address. This helps further protect your account from being stolen by a potential phisher.
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_LABEL: I never received the verification email, what should I do ?
VerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_TEXT: If you do not receive your signup verification email and you are running a Spam filter, check and make sure the message has not been filtered as spam. Please try adding {email} to your contacts or trusted senders list within your email client and attempt to re-verify your email address. You can also click the button below and we'll send you the email again.
VerifyEmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: Enter the code received by email to validate your email address
VerifyEmailManager.EMAIL_VERIFIED: Your address has been verified. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.
VerifyEmailManager.ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid code, request a new one
